segments.text: Thanks for the advice , Mr . Macmillan . I'll keep it in mind . I had better head off though . I ’ m meeting my husband for dinner .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'm heading out myself . Enjoy your evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , sir . You too . Drive safely , I hear there ’ s a lot ice on the roads .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for the warning ! See you tomorrow !
segments.speaker: S2
